mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Marshall University Archives and Special Collections
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Ebenezer Methodist Church interior, Huntington,WVa, 1939, black and white photograph. This appears to have been the African-American Church that merged with The Evangelical United Brethren Church to form a new church: Ebenezer United Methodist Church.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Churches
Methodist Episcopal churches
Methodist churches
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Ebenezer Methodist Church interior, Huntington, WV
